verbose_text: The present study indicates that the Cockcroft-Gault equation is a better predictor of appropriate dabigatran etexilate dosing than the CKD-EPI and CKD-EPI-BSA equations as they do not effectively prevent the recommendation of inappropriately high doses of dabigatran.
evidence: dabigatran etexilate dosing than the CKD-EPI and CKD-EPI-BSA equations as they do not effectively prevent the recommendation of inappropriately high doses of dabigatran
